articles.description: Fox News Biden family adopts new pup named Major, Delaware Humane Association says Fox News The Bidens have welcomed a furry new addition to their family, an adopted pup named Major, an animal organization said. The Delaware Humane Association (DHA) announced…
articles.content: The Bidens have welcomed a furry new addition to their family, an adopted pup named Major, an animal organization said. The Delaware Humane Association (DHA) announced via Facebook Saturday that Major had found “his forever home” with the former vice presiden… [+1198 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Zwirz
articles.title: State Department says reports about 'final conclusion' on Khashoggi 'are inaccurate'
articles.description: The State Department on Saturday insisted that the U.S. had not yet reached a determination regarding the death of writer and activist Jamal Khashoggi, adding that there are "numerous unanswered questions."
articles.content: The State Department on Saturday insisted that despite recent reports, the U.S. had not yet reached a determination regarding the death of writer and activist Jamal Khashoggi, and that there remain “numerous unanswered questions.” The department’s statement c… [+3164 chars]
